keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver Brexit, no ifs or buts - then we can get on with securing a better, brighter future for you, your family and for Lancaster and Fleetwood.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Our NHS, Education and Living Standards
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work to protect our precious NHS; to ensure everyone has access to affordable housing and that our young people are given the education and skills they need. I am backing the 3.9% increase in the State Pension for 13 million, and I welcome the £34m boost for the Royal Lancaster Infirmary.
Support our vital agricultural industry; work to make sure our rural communities are well-connected; help tackle social isolation and ensure we get extra police officers in the constituency.

issues.brexitEurope: Deliver Brexit, no ifs or buts - then we can get on with securing a better, brighter future for you, your family and for Lancaster and Fleetwood.
issues.education: Ensure everyone has access to affordable housing and that our young people are given the education and skills they need.

housing.content: Ensure everyone has access to affordable housing.

images.caption: Louise Thistlethwaite in Lancaster and Fleetwood
